localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will oversee the formation of patrol groups to operate within the commandery, recruiting from the peasantry to overwhelm local bandits with superior numbers.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will oversee the formation of patrol groups to operate within the commandery, recruiting from the peasantry to overwhelm local bandits with superior numbers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will probe the black market within the commandery, interrogating and bribing informants to reveal the whereabouts of armaments, accessories, mounts, or followers that might be of interest to you.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will probe the black market within the commandery, interrogating and bribing informants to reveal the whereabouts of armaments, accessories, mounts, or followers that might be of interest to you.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will travel door-to-door throughout the commandery, taking a census of all able-bodied men obligated to bolster our numbers whenever casualties of war are suffered.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will travel door-to-door throughout the commandery, taking a census of all able-bodied men obligated to bolster our numbers whenever casualties of war are suffered.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will introduce updated agricultural practices to the commandery, such as alternating field systems and pit field techniques, thus achieving faster crop yields.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will introduce updated agricultural practices to the commandery, such as alternating field systems and pit field techniques, thus achieving faster crop yields.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will distribute stockpiled reserves to appease the people.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will distribute stockpiled reserves to appease the people.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will encourage the rural peasantry to enlist in public schools, increasing educational standards and incentivising engagement in commerce and trade.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will encourage the rural peasantry to enlist in public schools, increasing educational standards and incentivising engagement in commerce and trade.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will delegate extra martial powers to local authorities within the commandery, allowing them to enforce more stringent security measures across all districts and trade routes.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will delegate extra martial powers to local authorities within the commandery, allowing them to enforce more stringent security measures across all districts and trade routes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will travel throughout the commandery to seek out individuals that meet the highest standards of xiaolian, bringing the most pious candidates to your attention for potential service.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will travel throughout the commandery to seek out individuals that meet the highest standards of xiaolian, bringing the most pious candidates to your attention for potential service.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will bolster conscription and replenishment of troops by requisitioning the surplus of reserves.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will bolster conscription and replenishment of troops by requisitioning the surplus of reserves.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will scrutinise the practises of all workshops within the commandery, overhauling where necessary to optimise productivity with any human cost a secondary consideration.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will scrutinise the practises of all workshops within the commandery, overhauling where necessary to optimise productivity with any human cost a secondary consideration.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will launch business ventures and oversee them within the commandery, making sure that the return from investment meets the standards of your house.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will launch business ventures and oversee them within the commandery, making sure that the return from investment meets the standards of your house.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Free to pursue their chosen vocation, this character spends time in this commandery, participating in administrative instruction.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Free to pursue their chosen vocation, this character spends time in this commandery, participating in administrative instruction.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Free to pursue their chosen vocation, this character spends time in this commandery, participating in military exercises.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Free to pursue their chosen vocation, this character spends time in this commandery, participating in military exercises.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Free to pursue their chosen vocation, this character spends time in this commandery, overseeing an industrial inspection.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Free to pursue their chosen vocation, this character spends time in this commandery, overseeing an industrial inspection.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Free to pursue their chosen vocation, this character spends time in this commandery on an academic sabbatical.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Free to pursue their chosen vocation, this character spends time in this commandery on an academic sabbatical.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Free to pursue their chosen vocation, this character spends time in this commandery, overseeing agricultural development.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will hold meetings with prominent merchants and business owners within the commandery, encouraging investment and commercial expansion through cronyism and nepotistic practices.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will hold meetings with prominent merchants and business owners within the commandery, encouraging investment and commercial expansion through cronyism and nepotistic practices.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will stimulate local markets by selling reserve surplus.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will stimulate local markets by selling reserve surplus.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will seek out willing militiamen within the commandery, equipping and coordinating them to mount localised responses to any enemy presence in their districts.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will seek out willing militiamen within the commandery, equipping and coordinating them to mount localised responses to any enemy presence in their districts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will supervise increased military enlistment efforts within the commandery, ensuring that all men with sufficient martial training are ready to come forward whenever we raise new forces.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will supervise increased military enlistment efforts within the commandery, ensuring that all men with sufficient martial training are ready to come forward whenever we raise new forces.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will oversee the food production within this commandery, ensuring that their immediate quotas are delivered, and that future harvests are sufficiently bountiful.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will oversee the food production within this commandery, ensuring that their immediate quotas are delivered, and that future harvests are sufficiently bountiful.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will assume control of all army logistics within the commandery, overseeing supply lines and authorising the redirection of funds where necessary to ensure the needs of local troops are met.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will assume control of all army logistics within the commandery, overseeing supply lines and authorising the redirection of funds where necessary to ensure the needs of local troops are met.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will carry out a rigorous inspection of the practises and financial affairs of all officials, bureaucrats, and civil servants within the commandery.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will carry out a rigorous inspection of the practises and financial affairs of all officials, bureaucrats, and civil servants within the commandery.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will personally manage all construction projects within the commandery, ensuring that any building endeavours are carried out with maximum efficiency.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will personally manage all construction projects within the commandery, ensuring that any building endeavours are carried out with maximum efficiency.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will lend assistance to our spy defence networks, bolstering our counter-espionage infrastructure to hinder any enemy efforts to undermine us from within.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will lend assistance to our spy defence networks, bolstering our counter-espionage infrastructure to hinder any enemy efforts to undermine us from within.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will act as an officer of your faction’s treasury within the commandery, carrying out tax collection and audits while also ensuring that the peasantry's labour corvée obligations to you are being fulfilled.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will act as an officer of your faction’s treasury within the commandery, carrying out tax collection and audits while also ensuring that the peasantry's labour corvée obligations to you are being fulfilled.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will provision any stockpiled reserves to increase military supplies in local armies.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will provision any stockpiled reserves to increase military supplies in local armies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will initiate a resettlement programme that attracts additional people by distributing reserve surplus to the people.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will initiate a resettlement programme that attracts additional people by distributing reserve surplus to the people.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will seek men of talent to support our cause. Mastery and understanding of the concepts of the way are identified through conversation, and through careful monitoring of a man's deeds.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will seek men of talent to support our cause. Mastery and understanding of the concepts of the way are identified through conversation, and through careful monitoring of a man's deeds.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will perform a rigorous inspection of the commandery's facilities and deliver the findings to its administrators, working with them to increase the efficiency of future construction projects.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will perform a rigorous inspection of the commandery's facilities and deliver the findings to its administrators, working with them to increase the efficiency of future construction projects.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will visit landowners and merchants to enlist their help and organise a roster of volunteers, so that the farmer's agricultural burden is eased by those who can afford the time.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will visit landowners and merchants to enlist their help and organise a roster of volunteers, so that the farmer's agricultural burden is eased by those who can afford the time.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will seek out the neediest households in the commandery and offer help, so that others are inspired by their good deeds and come to understand the strength that can be gained through compassion and shared responsibility.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will seek out the neediest households in the commandery and offer help, so that others are inspired by their good deeds and come to understand the strength that can be gained through compassion and shared responsibility.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will carry out an unflinching audit of the commandery's spending, pruning away even the most insignificant, unnecessary expenditure and examining alternatives to vital, but costly, ventures.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will carry out an unflinching audit of the commandery's spending, pruning away even the most insignificant, unnecessary expenditure and examining alternatives to vital, but costly, ventures.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will meet with the commandery's civil servants, teaching them that true happiness comes with putting others before themselves, so that they are dissuaded from corruption through altruism rather than fear of punishment.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will meet with the commandery's civil servants, teaching them that true happiness comes with putting others before themselves, so that they are dissuaded from corruption through altruism rather than fear of punishment.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will hold daily meditation and chanting rituals available to all, so that all can learn how to bring their qi into balance and banish sickness.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will hold daily meditation and chanting rituals available to all, so that all can learn how to bring their qi into balance and banish sickness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will make regular tours of the commandery, visiting peasants, merchants and civil servants alike, to espouse the teachings of the Tao to all, regardless of station or wealth, so that all feel valued.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will make regular tours of the commandery, visiting peasants, merchants and civil servants alike, to espouse the teachings of the Tao to all, regardless of station or wealth, so that all feel valued.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Warriors of great strength and prowess are easily manipulated by their pride; it will take heroes of compassion, humility and frugality to purge this tyranny from the land. You will travel to the commandery to find such characters.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Warriors of great strength and prowess are easily manipulated by their pride; it will take heroes of compassion, humility and frugality to purge this tyranny from the land. You will travel to the commandery to find such characters.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will oversee a collection and organisation of ancient Taoist texts to make them more accessible to all, and will remain on hand to offer advice or interpretations to prevent their wisdom being misconstrued.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will oversee a collection and organisation of ancient Taoist texts to make them more accessible to all, and will remain on hand to offer advice or interpretations to prevent their wisdom being misconstrued.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your attendant will travel through the commandery, enlisting followers of the Way to then go out and find or convince others to join the Yellow Turbans, increasing our numbers significantly.

ui_character_assignments.localised_description: Your attendant will travel through the commandery, enlisting followers of the Way to then go out and find or convince others to join the Yellow Turbans, increasing our numbers significantly.
